repository.note: The default repository varies among BSD Operating System variants. The default repositories are http://pkg.freebsd.org for FreeBSD, https://cdn.openbsd.org/pub/OpenBSD for OpenBSD, and https://cdn.netbsd.org/pub/NetBSD for NetBSD.

namespace_definition.note: The namespace is the "vendor" name such as "freebsd", "openbsd", or "netbsd". It is not case sensitive and must be lowercased.

name_definition.note: The name is the package name and is case sensitive.

version_definition.note: The version is the version of the package.

qualifiers_definition.description: The target architecture for the package.
The BSD release version or distribution variant.
The package epoch number used for version comparison when normal version ordering is insufficient.
